text.section:
This section applies to a distributor or wholesaler of sparklers or sparkling devices who:
intends to conduct business in the State; or
sells, ships, or assigns for sale in the State the products of the distributor or wholesaler.
A distributor or wholesaler shall register annually with the State Fire Marshal on forms the State Fire Marshal provides.
The annual fee for registration under this section is $750.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 1 year or a fine not exceeding $1,000 or both.
